titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the University of Pittsburgh Archives Information Files, c. 1900-present UA.Info.Files
titlestmt.author: Ashley Taylor.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-08 17:37:20 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: University of Pittsburgh Archives Information Files

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Pittsburgh. Archives Service Center

did.abstract: The University of Pittsburgh Archives Information Files contain brochures, news clippings, press releases and other materials about University of Pittsburgh offices and departments, as well as some programs and events. There is at least one folder in the Information File for each of the headings listed below. Items in the UA Information Files are available for public use in the Archives Service Center Reading Room and may be photocopied upon request.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [folder name], University of Pittsburgh Archives Information Files, University Archives, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Created by various University Archivists since 1968.
